thread.section_title: RushMyPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushMyPassport.com | rushmypassport.com | 5 of 151
thread.title: David Masters

author: David Masters
title: David Masters
text: Overall, my experience was good. The only bad mark I would give would be for trying to upgrade my passport service. I called in the morning and asked about it, the person taking the call said they would connect me with a manager and then I was put on hold. After about 20 minutes, I was disconnected. This happened 3 times, 3 different people - elevator music for 3 minutes then 17 minutes of static - then "click" dial tone. I called one more time (about 3 hours later) and was finally connected to a manager. I received my passports without any other issues. Thank you Merciline Ofelin and team!
